input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Democratic Chino"
Reference Product Description:
Originally issued to American soldiers during WWII, the first military chinos were celebrated for their comfort, versatility, and impressive ruggedness. They proved so popular, in fact, that soldiers held onto their well-worn pairs even after discharge, and as more and more civilians took notice, the style became a fixture of garages and workshops as well as college campuses and city streets all across the country. Featuring 100% Responsible materials and an updated silhouette, The Foundation Pant is both a reinvention of our earlier chinos and an elevated reimagining of the all-purpose originals, built to help you start your day on solid ground. Because it's been garment dyed and washed, it has the character of a well-loved vintage piece, and it'll continue to pick up a ton of nuance with wear. Cool herringbone accents at the waistband and the pockets serve as a nod to the style's military origins. SPECIFICATIONS Classic medium rise, tailored fit, straight through the thigh with a slight taper from knee to leg opening. Available in 32" inseam. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. 5-oz. 100% organic cotton herringbone pocketing. Garment dyed and washed for a vintage feel. Front slash pockets allow easy entry into pockets. Low-profile welt coin pocket inset at waistband. Two back welt pockets. 4-hole vintage military style button at waistband. YKK zipper fly. Bound fly and outseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China. Model is 6'1", wearing a 32.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Dockers Men's Classic Fit Perfect Chino Pant'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's 484 Slim-Fit Five-Pocket Pant'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's 250 Skinny-Fit Stretch Chino Pants'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's 770 Straight-Fit Tech Oxford Pant'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Aiden Slim Fit Chino Pants'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Athletic Rapid Movement Chino Pants'
  - Name='Men's Slim Lived-In Chino'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's 770 Straight-Fit Bergen Five-Pocket Pant'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Athletic Slim Linen-Cotton Chino Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Relaxed Cotton Ankle Pants'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Lightweight Sweat Wide Pants'
  - Name='Club Monaco Stretch Linen Suit Trouser'
  - Name='Club Monaco Linen Elasticated Trousers'
  - Name='Men Big & Tall Weekday Warrior Dress Pants by Bonobos'
  - Name='Men's Slim Lived-In Chino'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Slim-Fit Trutemp365 Chino Pant'
  - Name='Banana Republic Charcoal Solid Chino Pants'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Classic-Fit Linen Trouser'
  - Name='Everlane The Performance Chino'
  - Name='Ministry of Supply Men's Pace Tapered Chino'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Stretch Cotton Trousers'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trousers in 30L Smooth Twill'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 32L Wovenair Trousers'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's The Carmel Vacation Pant'
  - Name='Bonobos Men's Lightweight Chino Slim'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Dockers Men's Classic Fit Perfect Chino Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit chino pants similar in style and intended use as everyday chinos, closely matching the reference's function and silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's 484 Slim-Fit Five-Pocket Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim-fit chino style pant with a five-pocket design comparable to the reference pant's silhouette and function, but with a slimmer fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's 250 Skinny-Fit Stretch Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Skinny fit chino pants share material and style family but differ substantially in silhouette compared to the tailored, slightly tapered fit of the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's 770 Straight-Fit Tech Oxford Pant
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight-fit pants made of Oxford cloth are similar in construction but may differ in fabric tech and intended use compared to classic chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Aiden Slim Fit Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit chino pants with similar tailoring and purpose, closely aligned with the reference product on fit and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Athletic Rapid Movement Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Chino pants designed for movement, sharing core chino features but with added stretch and athletic fit differing from the referenceâ€™s tailored fit.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit chinos meant to emulate vintage and worn-in character aligning well with the vintage feel and silhouette of the reference chinos.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit chinos meant to emulate vintage and worn-in character aligning well with the vintage feel and silhouette of the reference chinos.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight-fit five-pocket pants similar in silhouette but may differ in fabric and purpose (Bergen style may be less chino-like).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Athletic Slim Linen-Cotton Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim chinos mixing linen and cotton, similar in fit but differing in fabric composition and intended seasonal wear compared to 100% cotton reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Relaxed Cotton Ankle Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Relaxed fit cotton pants share material basis but differ considerably in silhouette from tailored tapered chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Men's Lightweight Sweat Wide Pants

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress pants designed for formal or office use differ markedly in style, silhouette, and fabric from chinos.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Duplicates earlier product name; slim lived-in chinos closely align with vintage-inspired, slim, tailored chinos like the reference.
